display_information.name: MCP Orchestrator
display_information.description: Connect AI tools to Slack with scoped permissions
display_information.long_description: MCP Orchestrator lets workspace members connect AI tools like Cursor and Claude Desktop to Slack through the Model Context Protocol (MCP). Each user controls their own read/write permissions and generates a scoped configuration with a personal token. The app enforces permissions server-side so the Slack bot token never leaves the server. Admins install once; every user self-serves from the App Home tab.
